snippet: After going 20-6 last season with a 2.73 E.R.A., the knuckleballer R. A. Dickey of the Mets won the Cy Young Award as the best pitcher in the National League.
abstract: New York Mets knuckleballer R A Dickey wins Cy Young Award as National League's best pitcher; in 2012, Dickey went 20-6 with 2.73 earned run average, leading league in innings (233 2/3), strikeouts (230), complete games (5) and shutouts (3); Tampa Bay Rays pitcher David Price wins American League honor.
lead_paragraph: After going 20-6 last season with a 2.73 E.R.A., the knuckleballer R. A. Dickey of the Mets won the Cy Young Award as the best pitcher in the National League.

headline.seo: Funny Pitch No More as the Knuckleballer R. A. Dickey Is Best in N.L.
headline.main: Funny Pitch No More: Mets’ Knuckleballer Wins League Honors
headline.print_headline: Funny Pitch No More: Mets’ Knuckleballer Wins League Honors
